name: react_template_repo
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon server/server.js" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Dakota Rennemann
